metadata.title: CVE-2024-57699 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was found in Netplex Json-smart 2.5.0 through 2.5.1. Whenloading a specially crafted JSON input, containing a large number of ’{’, astack exhaustion can be trigger, which could allow an attacker to cause aDenial of Service (DoS). This issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2023-1370.

criterions.comment: json-smart package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
